VREyeParametersFieldOfView.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The fieldOfView read-only property of the interface returns a object describing the current field of view for the eye, which can vary as the user adjusts their interpupillary distance (IPD).

blockquote.para: Note: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.
